nodes.text: Mark "Crash" McCreery is an American artist. McCreery is known for his work with Stan Winston and his studio with McCreery creating concept art for films such as Terminator 2: Judgement Day, Predator 2, and Jurassic Park along with two of its sequels The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III.

After working with Gary Gerani on the Topps trading card series Universal Monsters Illustrated, Gerani wanted McCreery to render a creature for the 1995 Topps Star Wars Galaxy Series 3 trading cards. McCreery chose to render Luke Skywalker selling his Landspeeder to the Vuvrian Wioslea.
